dc_title_s: A map of the acting superintendency of Michigan.
dc_description_s: Color reproduction of original manuscript map. Shows reservations and agency sites in Michigan and includes table of reservation populations. Facsimile copy from The National Archives. Original version published Michilimackinac : Septr. 15th 1837.: Original version published [Washington, D.C.] : [The National Archives], [2012]; Scale not given
